text:
We have a slipstream method for our images that have been working pretty
flawlessly to slip those drivers in. 
For some RD Farms at accounting firms we’ve shoehorned Vista x64 drivers in
because, you know, they won’t let go of that old iron. 
There are ways to get drivers to behave that should not be a problem in the long
term. Though, we still need to test it. 
We’re fortunate that our clients sole source with us or go with the products we
recommend for them to use. They know the pain when someone brings something into
the mix that was not on the approved list of products that can be used and the
cost to productivity, and us trying to get it to work, so are more than happy to
do what they need with the acceptable products list. 
We’re at that crossroads eh? 
Stability <------------

metadata.topic: RE: Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings.

metadata.email_text_original:
RE: Microsoft stop messing with my people's task bar settings. 
We have a slipstream method for our images that have been working pretty
flawlessly to slip those drivers in. 
For some RD Farms at accounting firms we’ve shoehorned Vista x64 drivers in
because, you know, they won’t let go of that old iron. 
There are ways to get drivers to behave that should not be a problem in the long
term. Though, we still need to test it. 
We’re fortunate that our clients sole source with us or go with the products we
recommend for them to use. They know the pain when someone brings something into
the mix that was not on the approved list of products that can be used and the
cost to productivity, and us trying to get it to work, so are more than happy to
do what they need with the acceptable products list. 
We’re at that crossroads eh? 
Stability <------------>Intrusion/Installation 
We’ll play around with both versions to see what happens. We have a few Dell
Mobile Precision Workstations sitting around that we can use as mules for our
testing along with some pretty common higher end peripherals that our clients
use. 
Philip Elder MCTS 
Senior Technical Architect 
Microsoft High Availability MVP
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmvp.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2FPublicProfile%2F4024277&data=05%7C01%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C2b0f811662ab427dddc408dbd5893f68%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638338557800333632%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C1000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=i8j4L2gjWY5beOeVR%2Fbq0YPZJQO18hWen9YEFMhoCyo%3D&reserved=0]
